entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.0°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
